D

deck - Variable in class Hanabi.Cards
 
Deck - Class in Hanabi
Main deck of the board, containing the cards not given to the players.
Deck() - Constructor for class Hanabi.Deck
Constructor of Deck Called at the very beginning of the program, it will set all the existing cards of Hanabi Game
Discard - Class in Hanabi
Discard deck, containing the cards discarded by the players.
Discard() - Constructor for class Hanabi.Discard
 
discardAndDraw(Board, int) - Method in class Hanabi.Player
Discards the card from the player's hand.
draw() - Method in class Hanabi.Deck
Pick the first card (the one on the top) of the deck and returns it
draw(Deck) - Method in class Hanabi.Hand
Draws a card from the board's main deck and adds it to the hand
